Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian team will be playing a minimum of 43 matches- 14 T20Is, 23 ODIs and 6 Tests in 2023.
The 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup will occur in the subcontinent from 26 October to 26 November, with 10 teams participating.
India will go into the World Cup as the favorites with them having the advantage of playing in home conditions.
India will tour South Africa for 2 Test, 3 ODI and 3 T20I matches at the end of the year, beginning in December and extending to the first month of 2024.
Others: India vs Sri Lanka (January, 2023): 3-match T20I series and 3-match ODI series.
India vs New Zealand (January - February): 3-match ODI series and 3-match T20I series.
India vs Australia (February - March): 4-match Test series and 3-match ODI series.
India vs West Indies (July - August, 2023): 2 Test matches, 3 ODIs and 3 T20Is.
Asia Cup (September, 2023): India will face their arch-rivals, Pakistan, in their first match.
India vs Australia (September- December, 2023): 3 ODI matches and 5 T20I matches.
